name: Island in Your Grasp
description:
Island in Your Grasp is a city-building puzzle game, in which you must settle an island and master its resources.

You start with nothing but a bunch of settlers and will gradually build up your population, providing them various resources. Build bigger, build better, supply more! Provide for the needs of your people and help them thrive, and eventually your colony will be large enough to sail to the distant shores.

Languages:

  • English
  • Russian
